This quality built 3 Bedroom home is the perfect fit for first home buyers, investors, or someone who's looking to downsize. Nearly New Home With the Perfect Blend of Style and Everyday Function
This 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom modern family home features premium inclusions and designer details with all the mod cons your family could need. Seamless indoor/outdoor living is achieved with the open-plan living/dining space leading through to the paved courtyard. The well maintained, sizeable backyard is a great space for the kids to enjoy hours of fun.
The master suite is an indulgent space with a spacious WIR and en suite, complete with a double vanity plus separate bath and shower. The additional bedrooms are a good size with gorgeous timber floors, BIRs and large window, bringing lots of light indoors. - Large block 501m2/ approx. 26 squares

- Option to convert living/home theatre into 5th bedroom
- Luxurious master suite with huge WIR and en suite
- 2 elegant bathrooms with quality fittings and finishes
- Paved outdoor living/dining space
- Gorgeous timber floors
- Central heating throughout
- Easy to maintain landscaped garden

CAMDEN GREENS ESTATE, CRANBOURNE NORTH: Set in a peaceful location directly opposite the back fairways of the popular Cranbourne Golf Club, this fine home promises a great lifestyle for a first home buyer, young family and even an investor looking to capitalize on the favorable rental market conditions.
Larger than expected both inside and out, 6 Islington Avenue strikes a perfect blend of space, comfort and easy lifestyle living with timber look flooring and tiling throughout to assist with the comfort levels of those with asthma or allergies.
Well presented and with 2 separate living zones, the property itself features a formal lounge with an adjoining study as well as an open plan family/meals area with a pristine kitchen that boasts all stainless steel appliances.
There are 4 robed bedrooms, the master itself located at the front of the floorplan complete with a walk-in wardrobe and its own ensuite. The remaining 3 rear-set bedrooms share the family bathroom and second toilet, while ducted heating and split-system cooling to both the living area and master bedroom provide respite throughout Melbourne's trying seasons.
Outside, the remote double lock up garage has secure internal access and the north facing backyard features a concreted under-roofline alfresco, established veggie patches and a handy garden shed.
Jam packed with quality housing, the Camden Greens estate is second to none and is situated within close proximity to all that is on offer in Narre Warren South, Berwick and Cranbourne. There is immediate access to local shopping precincts, including the thriving Casey Central shopping centre, while public transport, sporting facilities and schools, such as Courtenay Gardens Primary, Lyndhurst Secondary College and Strathaird Primary, are only moments away. Those of you who work or enjoy wining and dining in the CBD will certainly appreciate the nearby freeway access.
If you want the opportunity to create a grand lifestyle then register your interest before it's SELLING, SELLING, SOLD!
